TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ExtenderControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExtenderControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl
Public MustInherit Class ExtenderControl Inherits Control Implements IExtenderControl
public ref class ExtenderControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IExtenderControl
type ExtenderControl = class inherit Control interface IExtenderControl

summary.span: 提供擴充項控制項的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您以程式設計方式將 AJAX 功能新增至 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。The class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control. 繼承自類別，並且實作介面。The inherits from the class and implements the interface. 類別會定義屬性、 方法和所共用的所有 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的事件。The class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls. 介面是抽象類別，您無法直接具現化。The interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly. 相反地，您會建立衍生的型別。Instead, you create a derived type. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別。The following example shows how to use the class. 此範例相關的教學課程，請參閱[建立擴充性控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55)。For a tutorial related to this example, see [Creating an Extender Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55).
